Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.name: major
Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.abstract: MAJOR update, i.e. first number(X.y.z) is larger

Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.name: minor
Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.abstract: MINOR update, i.e. second number(x.Y.z) is larger

Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.name: patch
Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.abstract: PATCH update, i.e. third number(x.y.Z) is larger

Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.name: none
Structs/Version/UpdateType.html#/s:10App.abstract: Not an update, i.e. versions are equal

Structs/Version/UpdateType.html.name: UpdateType
Structs/Version/UpdateType.html.abstract: Update type, based on comparison of two semantic versions, i.e. 1.1.1 < 2.0.0

Structs/Version.html#/s:10AppVersion0B0V.abstract: Implementation of Comparable protocol, allows to compare objects of Version type

Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.name: appId
Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.abstract: Application id, used to uniquely identify app

Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.name: currentVersion
Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.abstract: Latest available App Store version in Semantic version format

Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.name: isCompatibleWithOS
Structs/AppStoreVersion.html#/s:10AppVer.abstract: Indicates if App Store version compatible with iOS installed on this device

Structs/AppInfo/VersionFormat.html.name: VersionFormat
Structs/AppInfo/VersionFormat.html.abstract: Version info in this available string formats.

Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:10AppVersion0A4I.name: version(with:)
Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:10AppVersion0A4I.abstract: Creates a version string, based on provided format

Structs/AppInfo.html.name: AppInfo
Structs/AppInfo.html.abstract: Provides information about installed app based on Bundle data

Structs/AppStoreVersion.html.name: AppStoreVersion
Structs/AppStoreVersion.html.abstract: Model representing App Store data for the app

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionCheckedForNewVersion()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: Succesefull check for new version in App Store

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionVersionCheckFailed()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: Failed check for new version in App Store

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionNewVersionDetected()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: New version detected in App Store. Fires for all update types: Major, Minor and Patch

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionSuppressedBySkipFlag()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: Update new version available delegates were suppressed by Skip this Update flag

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionFirstLaunchForThisVersion()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: Current app version launched for the first time

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionUserPressedUpdate()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: User accepted update proposal, i.e. pressed Update button

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionUserPressedSkip()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: User Skipped proposed update, i.e pressed SKip button

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionUserPressedCancel()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: User dismissed update proposal, i.e. pressed Cancel button

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.name: appVersionUserPressedNeverPresent()
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html#/s:10A.abstract: User requested to silence update proposals forever, i.e. pressed Never button

Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html.name: AppVersionDelegate
Protocols/AppVersionDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate methods which allow expose a set of events to control update checking workflow

Extensions/UITableView.html#/s:So11UITab.name: addVersionFooter(with:alignment:textColor:footerHeight:)
Extensions/UITableView.html#/s:So11UITab.abstract: Adds version label into the table footer.

Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.name: skippable
Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.abstract: Update can be skipped or postponed, presented buttons: Update, Skip, Cancel + Never(must be explicitly enabled with neverEnabled property)

Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.name: unskippable
Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.abstract: Update can’t be skipped but can be postponed, presented buttons: Update, Cancel + Never(must be explicitly enabled with neverEnabled property)

Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.name: blocking
Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html#/s:10A.abstract: Update can’t be skipped or postponed, presented buttons: Update. App UI will be completely BLOCKED, use carefully

Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html.name: AlertType
Classes/AppVersion/AlertType.html.abstract: Update-suggestion UI Alert Type, used to set the desired update workflow

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: shared
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: AppVersion Singleton

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: delegate
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Delegate chaining AppVersionDelegate methods

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: updateFrequency
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Defines the frequency of App Store update requests in days, default: 0 - means with each app launch

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: checkBeforeUpdatePresented
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Checks you want to make before presenting update-suggesting UI. If returns true - UI will be presented, if false UI will be supressed

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: appStoreVersionInfo
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Inforfmation about the latest version available in App Store

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: neverEnabled
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Allows user to silence update-suggestion UI forever, i.e. alert will be never shown again. False by default

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertsEnabled
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Enables update-suggestion UI Alerts. False by default

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: minorAlertsDisabled
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Disables update-suggestion UI Alerts for Minor updates. False by default

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: patchAlertsDisabled
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Disables update-suggestion UI Alerts for Patch updates. False by default

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertPresentationStyle
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: UIAlertController alert presentation style. alert by default

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertType
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Update-suggestion UI Alert Type, unskippable by default. Rewrites alertTypeMajor,alertTypeMinor and alertTypePatch when set.

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertTypeMajor
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Update-suggestion UI Alert Type for Major update, unskippable by default.

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertTypeMinor
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Update-suggestion UI Alert Type for Minor update, unskippable by default.

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: alertTypePatch
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Update-suggestion UI Alert Type for Patch update, unskippable by default.

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: run()
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Initializes AppVersion, call it from application(_ application: UIApplication,didFinishLaunchingWithOptions launchOptions:…) delegate in your AppDelegate

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: checkAppStoreForUpdateNow()
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Checks for update, non-blocking. Use it when you need to force the check ignoring updateFrequency setting

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: resetAppVersionState()
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Resets all persistance information stored by AppVersion: version launch history and user preferences(skip, never)

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: lastCheckDate
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Date on which last check for update was performed

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: skipVersion
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Update version which user decided to skip

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: versionHistory
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Version history installed & launched on this device, contains launch counts for each version.

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: launchesForThisVersion
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Returns number of launches for this version

Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.name: neverShowAlert
Classes/AppVersion.html#/s:10AppVersionA.abstract: Indicates if user asked to silence update-suggesting UI alerts

Classes/AppVersion.html.name: AppVersion
Classes/AppVersion.html.abstract: AppVersion provides a set of properties and methods to configure app update tracking behaviour.

Classes/AppVersionLabel.html.name: AppVersionLabel
Classes/AppVersionLabel.html.abstract: UILabel which is autopopulated with information about installed version of the app.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
